backend/main.mo: Manages per-caller app settings with access control checks for viewing and saving settings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing features, linked files, components, and test IDs for Namaz Öğretici updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files covering styling, data fetching, settings, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a full OKLCH color variable scheme for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, Inter font, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout with header and five-tab mobile navigation including Namaz Öğretici.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the authentication button component.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Responsive five-tab navigation component using shadcn Tabs with icons.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: UI card prompting the user to pick a location with a button callback.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Displays an Esmaül Hüsna item in a colored card with Arabic name, transliteration, and tap hint.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/esmaul: Defines the EsmaulHusnaItem interface and provides an array of Esmaül Hüsna names with Arabic text, transliteration, Turkish meaning, and related duas.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Renders grid of Esmaül Hüsna cards and a dialog showing selected item details and dua.
frontend/src/features/home/currentPrayer: Provides logic to determine the current prayer time slot from adjusted prayer times by comparing minutes.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeTab.tsx: Main home tab UI that shows location selection, weather data, next prayer countdown, and prayer time cards with adjusted prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/NextPrayerCou: Displays the next prayer name, its time, and remaining countdown using computed next prayer data.
frontend/src/features/home/PrayerTimeCar: Renders interactive cards for verse, hadith, dua, and Esma content based on the current prayer slot and opens detailed dialogs.
frontend/src/features/home/time-content/: Contains a list of dua items with Arabic text, Turkish meaning, and occasions for contextual usage.
Contains a list of hadith entries with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and source references.
Defines a VerseItem interface and exports an array of Quran verse objects with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and references.
frontend/src/features/home/useCurrentPra: React hook that determines and updates the current prayer slot every minute using adjusted prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/useNextPrayer: React hook that finds the next prayer time and computes a live countdown updated every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/usePrayerTime: Selects deterministic random verse, hadith, dua, and esma content based on the current prayer slot.
frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: UI component for searching, selecting, and saving a user location using geocoding results.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Provides a function to search locations via Open-Meteo API and convert results into internal Location objects.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for Location and GeocodingResult objects.
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: React Query hook that performs debounced geocoding searches when input text has at least two characters.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/Nam: Interactive tutorial component for prayer steps with gender selection, swipe navigation, and rakat info.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/nam: Exports prayer rakat counts and step-by-step instructional content for men’s and women’s prayer flows.
Fetches today's prayer times from the Aladhan API and maps the response to a normalized structure.
frontend/src/features/prayer/PrayerTimes: Displays adjusted prayer times based on user location and offset settings, with UI for offset editing.
Applies minute offsets to individual prayer times and returns adjusted prayer time objects.
frontend/src/features/prayer/usePrayerTi: React Query hook that loads prayer times for a given location via the Aladhan API.
frontend/src/features/settings/appSettin: Defines the shape of application settings including location, offsets, notifications, and zikirmatik values.
frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: Handles loading, migration, and saving of app settings in localStorage with versioned schema support.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsT: Provides UI for editing the global time offset and individual prayer notification lead times.
frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: React Query wrapper for reading and updating persistent app settings through local storage.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: Fetches current weather data from Open-Meteo and provides a utility to map weather codes to descriptions.
frontend/src/features/weather/useWeather: React Query hook that retrieves current weather data for a given location.
frontend/src/features/weather/WeatherSec: Displays weather information for the user’s location, including temperature, conditions, wind, and humidity.
frontend/src/features/zikirmatik/Zikirma: Implements a digital counter with target tracking, progress display, and persistence via app settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for managing Internet Identity login flow, storing identities, and exposing login/clear/status helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a warm color palette with light/dark modes and a background pattern utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query and hash routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Describes the current app plan and requirements, including prayer times logic, Esmaül Hüsna, Zikirmatik features, and image needs.
